name: RC Airplane Flight Simulator
description:
Fly remote controlled airplanes and collect stars at three different places: Office, Supermarket and Warehouse.

There are four airplanes. Collect diamonds from special locations and unlock all of them.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive flight simulation game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.
